scripts.deploy-gh-pages: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add -f out/ && git checkout -b temp-for-deploy-gh-pages && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree split --prefix out -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages && git checkout main && git branch -D temp-for-deploy-gh-pages
